document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Contained </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">short </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Life </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">magical </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">extents </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">soul </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">returning </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8"> </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">soft </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">night </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7cf0ff">steal </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">securer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thence </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">children </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">strictly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">kept </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Take </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">sooner </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70e498">sea </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">waters </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">brawling </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Brook </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">think </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">infinity </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Contained in this short life
